This is a story about BlackJack(ish)

Tech Used HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Canvas, Paint 3D
Class Game (card, strategy)
Description This game will remind you of Blackjack or 21. There is no insurance or doubling down, simply choose cards to get closest to the card value 21 without going over. But, you must also beat the dealer's hand.

BlackJack(ish) is a simple program written to improve my Javascript skills. I had the wonderful opportunity to put into action and gain a better understanding of JS concepts such as hoisting, understanding scope and closure.

After completing the base program, I came back to it to expand it by implementing a light/dark theme and granting the user the deck choice. It gives me personal joy to find creative ways to grant the user choices in a program.

Adding on to the program taught me the value of inter-program comments, and how to simplify my program to make it easier to modify and/or understand for those that come after that wish to manipulate the code (even if that is a future version of myself!). These are lessons every coder must learn.
